rukus.text: 52|29|Ata'eba apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana, apanara rabera anugrahe apani ganaka nana, unmada'o nana.
52|30|Naki tara bale, ‘se ekajana kabi? Amara tara mrtyura pratiksa karachi.
52|31|Baluna, ‘tomara pratiksa kara, ami'o tomadera sathe pratiksakaridera antarbhukta [1].’
52|32|Naki tadera bibeka-bud'dhi taderake e adesa dicche, baram tara eka simalanghanakari sampradaya [1].
52|33|Naki tara bale, ‘e kura'ana se baniye baleche?’ Baram tara imana anabe na.
52|34|Ata'eba, tara yadi satyabadi haya tabe etara mata kono bani niye asuka na [1]
52|35|tara ki srasta chara srsti hayeche, na tara nijera'i srasta [1]
52|36|naki tara asamanasamuha o yamina srsti kareche? Baram tara drrha bisbasa kare na.
52|37|Apanara rabera guptabhandara ki tadera kache rayeche, naki tara e sabakichura niyanta
52|38|naki tadera kono simri ache yate arohana kare tara sune thake? Thakale tadera se srota suspasta pramana niye asuka
52|39|tabe ki kan'ya santana tamra jan'ya ebam putra santana tomadera jan'ya
52|40|tabe ki apani tadera kache parisramika cacchena ye, tara etake ekati durbaha bojha mane kare
52|41|naki gayebi bisaye tadera kono jnana ache ye, tara ta likhache
52|42|naki tara kono sarayantra karate caya? Pariname yara kuphari kare tara'i habe sarayantrera sikara [1].
52|43|Naki allaha chara odera an'ya kono ilaha ache? Tara ye sirka sthira kare allah‌ ta theke pabitra
52|44|ara tara akasera kono khanda bhenge parate dekhale balabe, ‘eta to eka punjibhuta megha.’
52|45|Ata'eba, taderake chere dina se dina paryanta, yedina tara bajraghate hatacetana habe.
52|46|Sedina tadera sarayantra kono kaje asabe na ebam taderake sahayya'o kara habe na.
52|47|Ara niscaya yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche echara aro sasti. Kintu tadera adhikansa'i ta jane na

52|48|ara apani dhairyadharana karuna apanara rabera sid'dhantera upara; niscaya apani amadera caksura samane'i rayechena [1]. Apani apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna yakhana apani dandayamana hana [2]
52|49|ara tamra pabitrata ghosana karuna ratera bela [1] o tarakara asta gamanera para [2].
